alert.note: Alert for Broward; Miami-Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 5:40PM EDT until June 17 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: The National Weather Service in Miami has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Miami-Dade County in southeastern Florida... Southern Broward County in southeastern Florida... * Until 615 PM EDT. * At 540 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Intersection I-75 And Griffin Road, or near Davie, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fort Lauderdale, Pembroke Pines, Hollywood, Miramar and Davie. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
